about_the_game:
Pigeon



An action-packed journey in which the young pigeon representative Richard embarks. Get acquainted with a unique universe, make unexpected friends, gradually revealing their history and mitives. From your actions and courage depends on the salvation of not only your native village, but also the whole world. Descend into a dangerous dungeon to find out the truth of the threat. But remember, the truth, has its price....


Original Universe


Before you is the beautiful island of Salzar, in the south of all continents. Paradise landscapes, and peaceful life has been in this beautiful place for thousands of years. The birds that live here are not even aware of the fact that another life echoes beneath the earth... a life of animalistic and primitive cruelty.


Unforgettable Characters


Pigeon features many species of birds, with their own appearances, and you will get to know many of them.
In this adventure, you'll get to see both familiar characters for Richard and new ones. Interact with completely different members of the avian species!


Player Integration


Almost everything you'll hear from the characters can not only be seen with your own eyes, but also felt tactilely through the mechanics. Everything the characters tell you about can be encountered in the game, and even used.


Open Communication with Characters


You can communicate with characters as you would yourself based on the situation. Some answers will get you to your goal faster, while others will delay you, but will help you learn more about the world around you.

Unusual dungeons


The most important aspect of the game is the dungeon. As usual, you decide how long you will stay there, and at any moment you can leave it and head back to the island to explore and help the inhabitants. However, "key" enemies do not rise from the dead, once you destroy them once you will not meet them again. Among other things, you always have access to backtracking to replenish resources.

Brutal Dungeon World

.
There are unpredictable opponents waiting for you inside. Upon learning of your presence, their animal instinct is to hunt you down. And while some creatures are only capable of scaring you, others pose a serious threat to the player. (Write about the bestiary)

Variability in combat

.
Everything you come at your opponent with has its own effect, whether it's a familiar sword or axe, or a bucket in your hands. You will always be able to choose what to fight with.

short_description: Pigeon is an action adventure in the original universe. Immerse yourself in a deep and interesting story. Playing as Richard, set out to save the village from the hordes of creatures that have been trapped for centuries in the bowels of the earth.
